author: Nicole Rand
title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!Read more

author: Andrea Kelley
title: Second shirt, just as in love!
body: This is my second shirt from Heml≈çya and I love it just as much as my starling shirt! It fits perfectly (no gaps!!) and it is so soft and comfy. Perfect work or date night shirt ü•∞Read more

author: Amanda Mitchell
title: Gorgeous, gorgeous, GORGEOUS!
body: I saw this shirt in an ad online and fell in love immediately with the pattern. I got it in the mail today and it‚Äôs even better in person than the pictures online! I‚Äôm trying to step up my clothing game a little, and I can‚Äôt wait to wear this to work! I think it‚Äôll look great dressed up or dressed down!Read more

author: Abby
title: Love this top!
body: I love this top and I love supporting a small business.Read more

author: Stephanie Orme
title: An instant must-have!
body: Sometimes you see a shirt and you're instantly like, "I have to own that!" That was me when I saw this gorgeous print. (I adore sterlings, for one). The design really pops in person. The shirt itself is high quality and has a luxurious feel to it. I like that I can wear it for work or just casually. Would definitely recommend!Read more

author: Alexandria
title: Love this shirt!
body: Absolutely love the shirt, its even better in person.Read more

author: C.F.
title: Perfect
body:
This shirt caught my eye - love at first sight!
I ordered it immediately from the other side of the planet. After long weeks of waiting (lost parcel), long exchanges with Samiha (extraordinarily available) who was struggling with the French post office to find my parcel... I received this beauty!
Thank you for everything: the design, the colors, the material and the good mood...Read more

author: Sarah Yuster
title: A perfect gift for my daughter!
body: The Forest shirt was a gift for my biologist/ecologist daughter. She called me nearly moved to tears when it arrived to tell me how much she loved it. Shes always loved colorful, quirky, feminine clothing and this ticked all those boxes along with the artful, accurate images of the tree frogs and poison frogs (both of which she studied in the field). The mushrooms and greenery add to the design and spectrum. Very happy to have found Hemloya!Read more

author: Jordan Williams
title: BUGSSSSü™≤
body: This shirt is without a doubt the greatest thing I‚Äôve ever worn! I love the material, design, and bold colors. I ordered the large I‚Äôm 5‚Äô5‚Äù and it‚Äôs still got a tailored fit. Sleeves stop half way down my bicep and shirt stops maybe 6 inches down from my hips so definitely size up.  Most of all I‚Äôm really happy with how helpful and responsive Samiha has been!Read more

I‚Äôm trying to step up my clothing game a little, and I can‚Äôt wait to wear this to work! I think it‚Äôll look great dressed up or dressed down!Read more

author: Abby
title: Love this top!
body: I love this top and I love supporting a small business.Read more

author: Stephanie Orme
title: An instant must-have!
body: Sometimes you see a shirt and you're instantly like, "I have to own that!" That was me when I saw this gorgeous print. (I adore sterlings, for one). The design really pops in person. The shirt itself is high quality and has a luxurious feel to it. I like that I can wear it for work or just casually. Would definitely recommend!Read more

author: Nicole Rand
title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!Read more

author: Andrea Kelley
title: Second shirt, just as in love!
body: This is my second shirt from Heml≈çya and I love it just as much as my starling shirt! It fits perfectly (no gaps!!) and it is so soft and comfy. Perfect work or date night shirt ü•∞Read more

author: Andrea Kelley
title: Love!!!
body: I love everything about this shirt. It fits perfectly, it‚Äôs soft and silky, and it looks amazing on its own or under a blazer. The artwork is absolutely gorgeous‚ÄîI‚Äôve already ordered the fox shirt!Read more

author: Alexandria
title: Love this shirt!
body: Absolutely love the shirt, its even better in person.Read more

author: C.F.
title: Perfect
body:
This shirt caught my eye - love at first sight!
I ordered it immediately from the other side of the planet. After long weeks of waiting (lost parcel), long exchanges with Samiha (extraordinarily available) who was struggling with the French post office to find my parcel... I received this beauty!
Thank you for everything: the design, the colors, the material and the good mood...Read more

author: Sarah Yuster
title: A perfect gift for my daughter!
body: The Forest shirt was a gift for my biologist/ecologist daughter. She called me nearly moved to tears when it arrived to tell me how much she loved it. Shes always loved colorful, quirky, feminine clothing and this ticked all those boxes along with the artful, accurate images of the tree frogs and poison frogs (both of which she studied in the field). The mushrooms and greenery add to the design and spectrum. Very happy to have found Hemloya!Read more

author: Jordan Williams
title: BUGSSSSü™≤
body: This shirt is without a doubt the greatest thing I‚Äôve ever worn! I love the material, design, and bold colors. I ordered the large I‚Äôm 5‚Äô5‚Äù and it‚Äôs still got a tailored fit. Sleeves stop half way down my bicep and shirt stops maybe 6 inches down from my hips so definitely size up.  Most of all I‚Äôm really happy with how helpful and responsive Samiha has been!Read more

author: Rebekah
title: @rffaubion Rebekah looking gorgeous wearing Starling button up!
body: Thank you for sharing this Rebekah!Read more

author: Christina Hamill
title: Love it!
body: This is my second shirt from this shop and I love it! The ladybug pattern is so cute! I love how bright and vibrant the colors are. I really like the feel of the fabric and how it's comfortable in the Texas heat. Thank you!Read more

author: R.M.
title: Stunning!
body: This color and print is so vibrant! I love the way it looks and fits, makes me feel beautiful. I bought this after purchasing one of the other button ups because I love them so much (I also bought two others, so I now have 4 total) - that‚Äôs how much I love these buttons ups!Read more

author: R.M.
title: AMAZING!
body:
This blouse is a beautifully designed dream to wear! The fabric feels like butter and the fit is perfect. Definitely size up, but it fitted in just the right spots and then nice and loose where you need it to be. I can already tell I will be living in this blouse all year round and I can‚Äôt wait to style it in so many different ways. 

When my blouse arrived, I immediately bought three more in the other designs because it‚Äôs just such a beautiful piece of art that you can also wear! I feel so happy and beautiful in this blouse!Read more

author: Anne O
body: The starling design and fabric will turn heads! I loved the dress so much I bought the blouse!!Read more

author: Rebecca Woolam
title: Gorgeous!
body: Absolutely gorgeous blouse! Makes the work-day that much better when I can wear such a unique piece! Received numerous compliments. Quality material and arrived fast! Don‚Äôt hesitate to order!Read more

author: leah koanui
body: Simone Top - Starling BirdRead more

author: Leslie
title: Gorgeous.
body: I just received this and haven‚Äôt even worn it out of the house yet. The fit is spot on (not billowy but tailored), the fabric is luscious & substantial so it will hold its shape, and the print is delightful. It feels good. My husband thinks it‚Äôs awesome, too. Thank you for your commitment to quality!Read more

body: Great print.  Great quality.  Amazing work.Read more

title: Lana top
body: Sharp and super cute! Absolutely adore the starling print. Fits great and the classic cut with the unique pattern will work wirh funky casual or more conservative "office-appropriate" outfits. Can't wait to style this piece!Read more

author: Rebecca Bissi
title: EXCELLENT
body:
My daughter selected two blouses from your collection. They are beautiful, look beautiful on her and the quality is excellent. 
    I will be purchasing more from you in the future.Read more

author: Lisa Barsotti
title: wonderful shirt
body:
unique beautiful shirt
    excellent customer service when i needed to exchange sizes!Read more

author: TM Mem
title: New favorite tops
body:
The colors are as vibrant as you see in the photos, the material is soft and shiny and the tops are so well made. More than all that - the designs are whimsical, bold, fun. The way the fabric, cut/shape and gorgeous designs come together always boosts my confidence when I wear them! Perfect under a suit for a professional meeting; equally fun with jeans for lunch with friends. Thank you, Hemloya :)
One tip: size up if you don‚Äôt want it to look super-fitted. Normally I‚Äôm an XS in tops, but purchased all in size M.Read more

author: Bethy Turton
body: Simone Top - HummingbirdRead more

author: Nicole Rand
title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!

body: Sharp and super cute! Absolutely adore the starling print. Fits great and the classic cut with the unique pattern will work wirh funky casual or more conservative "office-appropriate" outfits. Can't wait to style this piece!Read more

author: Rebecca Bissi
title: EXCELLENT
body:
My daughter selected two blouses from your collection. They are beautiful, look beautiful on her and the quality is excellent. 
    I will be purchasing more from you in the future.Read more

author: Lisa Barsotti
title: wonderful shirt
body:
unique beautiful shirt
    excellent customer service when i needed to exchange sizes!Read more

author: TM Mem
title: New favorite tops
body:
The colors are as vibrant as you see in the photos, the material is soft and shiny and the tops are so well made. More than all that - the designs are whimsical, bold, fun. The way the fabric, cut/shape and gorgeous designs come together always boosts my confidence when I wear them! Perfect under a suit for a professional meeting; equally fun with jeans for lunch with friends. Thank you, Hemloya :)
One tip: size up if you don‚Äôt want it to look super-fitted. Normally I‚Äôm an XS in tops, but purchased all in size M.Read more

author: Bethy Turton
body: Simone Top - HummingbirdRead more

author: Madeline Tollefson
title: Lana top- butterfly
body: Great with Jeans, & can be worn with dressy black Leather pants!  My hubb really likes it too!Read more

author: Theresa L
title: So fun and flattering!
body: I really loved the unique design and color of this shirt. I wasn‚Äôt sure how it would look on me but once it arrived I fell in love!! It really fits my style and personality. It also brings out my confidence :). I am so happy with this purchase!Read more

author: Kaety Byerley
title: Gorgeous shirt!
body: I rarely buy anything I can't feel or try on but when I saw this shirt on IG I just went for it. I am so happy I did! It's a nice, light satin fabric, and it's well-sewn. I ordered a medium and it fits perfectly ( I am usually between a S and M, 36C). Wore it once so far and got tons of compliments!Read more

author: Anonymous
title: So Unique and Fun!
body: Love this shirt - the artwork and fabric are both exceptional. I am glad I followed the advice of other customers and took my measurements before ordering to ensure a perfect fit. This is truly a one of a kind shirt and is a delight to wear; perfect for dressing up with a jacket or going casual with jeans. I‚Äôll definitely be getting another  design!Read more

author: Amanda Banik
body: Very well crafted, unique shirt. Fits perfectly!Read more

author: Nicole Rand
title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!

author: Andrea Kelley
title: Second shirt, just as in love!
body: This is my second shirt from Heml≈çya and I love it just as much as my starling shirt! It fits perfectly (no gaps!!) and it is so soft and comfy. Perfect work or date night shirt ü•∞

author: Amanda Mitchell
title: Gorgeous, gorgeous, GORGEOUS!
body: I saw this shirt in an ad online and fell in love immediately with the pattern. I got it in the mail today and it‚Äôs even better in person than the pictures online! I‚Äôm trying to step up my clothing game a little, and I can‚Äôt wait to wear this to work! I think it‚Äôll look great dressed up or dressed down!

author: Abby
title: Love this top!
body: I love this top and I love supporting a small business.

author: Stephanie Orme
title: An instant must-have!
body: Sometimes you see a shirt and you're instantly like, "I have to own that!" That was me when I saw this gorgeous print. (I adore sterlings, for one). The design really pops in person. The shirt itself is high quality and has a luxurious feel to it. I like that I can wear it for work or just casually. Would definitely recommend!

title: Love this shirt!
body: Absolutely love the shirt, its even better in person.Read more

author: C.F.
title: Perfect
body:
This shirt caught my eye - love at first sight!
I ordered it immediately from the other side of the planet. After long weeks of waiting (lost parcel), long exchanges with Samiha (extraordinarily available) who was struggling with the French post office to find my parcel... I received this beauty!
Thank you for everything: the design, the colors, the material and the good mood...Read more

author: Sarah Yuster
title: A perfect gift for my daughter!
body: The Forest shirt was a gift for my biologist/ecologist daughter. She called me nearly moved to tears when it arrived to tell me how much she loved it. Shes always loved colorful, quirky, feminine clothing and this ticked all those boxes along with the artful, accurate images of the tree frogs and poison frogs (both of which she studied in the field). The mushrooms and greenery add to the design and spectrum. Very happy to have found Hemloya!Read more

author: Jordan Williams
title: BUGSSSSü™≤
body: This shirt is without a doubt the greatest thing I‚Äôve ever worn! I love the material, design, and bold colors. I ordered the large I‚Äôm 5‚Äô5‚Äù and it‚Äôs still got a tailored fit. Sleeves stop half way down my bicep and shirt stops maybe 6 inches down from my hips so definitely size up.  Most of all I‚Äôm really happy with how helpful and responsive Samiha has been!Read more

author: Rebekah
title: @rffaubion Rebekah looking gorgeous wearing Starling button up!
body: Thank you for sharing this Rebekah!Read more

author: Christina Hamill
title: Love it!
body: This is my second shirt from this shop and I love it! The ladybug pattern is so cute! I love how bright and vibrant the colors are. I really like the feel of the fabric and how it's comfortable in the Texas heat. Thank you!Read more

author: R.M.
title: Stunning!
body: This color and print is so vibrant! I love the way it looks and fits, makes me feel beautiful. I bought this after purchasing one of the other button ups because I love them so much (I also bought two others, so I now have 4 total) - that‚Äôs how much I love these buttons ups!Read more

author: R.M.
title: AMAZING!
body:
This blouse is a beautifully designed dream to wear! The fabric feels like butter and the fit is perfect. Definitely size up, but it fitted in just the right spots and then nice and loose where you need it to be. I can already tell I will be living in this blouse all year round and I can‚Äôt wait to style it in so many different ways. 

When my blouse arrived, I immediately bought three more in the other designs because it‚Äôs just such a beautiful piece of art that you can also wear! I feel so happy and beautiful in this blouse!Read more

author: Anne O
body: The starling design and fabric will turn heads! I loved the dress so much I bought the blouse!!Read more

title: Gorgeous!
body: Absolutely gorgeous blouse! Makes the work-day that much better when I can wear such a unique piece! Received numerous compliments. Quality material and arrived fast! Don‚Äôt hesitate to order!Read more

body: I just received this and haven‚Äôt even worn it out of the house yet. The fit is spot on (not billowy but tailored), the fabric is luscious & substantial so it will hold its shape, and the print is delightful. It feels good. My husband thinks it‚Äôs awesome, too. Thank you for your commitment to quality!Read more

title: Love it! üòç

author: Hannah Ainsworth
title: Beautiful shirt and great fit!
body: Shirt print is as gorgeous in person as it looks online. Fabric is a good weight (not too thin) and looks well made (I feel like it will hold up for a long time). Shirt has a nice tailored look that remains crisp the whole day (thanks to fabric quality). Do follow the sizing guide. Based on sizing guide (and suggestions to size up), I bought a medium, despite usually being a XS or S in more mainstream brands. Medium was perfect fit. Highly recommend!Read more

author: E.T.
title: Pretty, but not busty-girl friendly :(
body:
First off, the print is vibrant and beautiful and it feels very high quality. The cut of it is very feminine and flattering. Despite what I‚Äôm about to say, I‚Äôm going to keep it since I love it so much and want to make it work.

I wear a 16/18 in most clothes, so I got a XXL to be safe (I also looked at the size chart). Unfortunately, this top has the problem most women‚Äôs button ups do: the bust!

I‚Äôm a DD, and even in my least padded and most constricting bra, I still get the ‚Äúgap‚Äù when buttoning up, since it can‚Äôt stretch over my chest. It‚Äôs not so tight that the shirt will rip off if I flex, but it‚Äôs noticeable and will have to be pinned to be wearable.

If you‚Äôve got a big chest, be careful. I hope women‚Äôs button ups start adding more buttons over the chest :(Read more

author: Eileen Reis
title: Fantastic Shirt
body: Just a glorious creation, this beautiful starling shirt!  Unique, comfortable, artfully crafted and dramatically beautiful.  Laundered like a dream - no ironing needed. I stand 4' 10" at 108 lbs - the small fits to perfection.Read more

body: I rarely buy anything I can't feel or try on but when I saw this shirt on IG I just went for it. I am so happy I did! It's a nice, light satin fabric, and it's well-sewn. I ordered a medium and it fits perfectly ( I am usually between a S and M, 36C). Wore it once so far and got tons of compliments!Read more

author: Anonymous
title: So Unique and Fun!
body: Love this shirt - the artwork and fabric are both exceptional. I am glad I followed the advice of other customers and took my measurements before ordering to ensure a perfect fit. This is truly a one of a kind shirt and is a delight to wear; perfect for dressing up with a jacket or going casual with jeans. I‚Äôll definitely be getting another  design!Read more

author: Amanda Banik
body: Very well crafted, unique shirt. Fits perfectly!Read more

author: Lisa Parisi
title: Love it! üòç
body: Such a beautiful print and perfect fit!Read more

author: Hannah Ainsworth
title: Beautiful shirt and great fit!
body: Shirt print is as gorgeous in person as it looks online. Fabric is a good weight (not too thin) and looks well made (I feel like it will hold up for a long time). Shirt has a nice tailored look that remains crisp the whole day (thanks to fabric quality). Do follow the sizing guide. Based on sizing guide (and suggestions to size up), I bought a medium, despite usually being a XS or S in more mainstream brands. Medium was perfect fit. Highly recommend!Read more

author: E.T.
title: Pretty, but not busty-girl friendly :(
body:
First off, the print is vibrant and beautiful and it feels very high quality. The cut of it is very feminine and flattering. Despite what I‚Äôm about to say, I‚Äôm going to keep it since I love it so much and want to make it work.

I wear a 16/18 in most clothes, so I got a XXL to be safe (I also looked at the size chart). Unfortunately, this top has the problem most women‚Äôs button ups do: the bust!

I‚Äôm a DD, and even in my least padded and most constricting bra, I still get the ‚Äúgap‚Äù when buttoning up, since it can‚Äôt stretch over my chest. It‚Äôs not so tight that the shirt will rip off if I flex, but it‚Äôs noticeable and will have to be pinned to be wearable.

If you‚Äôve got a big chest, be careful. I hope women‚Äôs button ups start adding more buttons over the chest :(Read more

author: Eileen Reis
title: Fantastic Shirt
body: Just a glorious creation, this beautiful starling shirt!  Unique, comfortable, artfully crafted and dramatically beautiful.  Laundered like a dream - no ironing needed. I stand 4' 10" at 108 lbs - the small fits to perfection.Read more

author: Denele Sakata
title: Mystical
body: This shirt is so much fun to wear. Expect compliments and conversation‚Ä¶Read more

title: Worth Every Penny!
body: This shirt is just amazing. The pattern is beautiful and vibrant, and has so much personality, everyone comments on how much they love it. The shirt is well made and the satin feel is so nice! I already bought another shirtRead more

author: Elizabeth Belanger
title: Fabulous!
body: Love the hummingbird print and the fit.  Also love that it didn‚Äôt shrink in the wash.Read more

author: Elizabeth Belanger
title: Fun shirt!
body: Love the print and the stylish fit.Read more

author: Margaret Dukes
title: Great and beautiful!
body: My one regret is I got a size too small and it doesn't come in a bigger size.Read more

author: Rachael Mady
title: Comfy stylish and fulfills bird nerd dreams
body: I adore birds and I wanted more clothes that I could wear for work and giving presentations. This shirt fits the bill and I can't wait to wear it all the time! Fit is true to size.Read more

author: Nicole Rand
title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!

author: Andrea Kelley
title: Second shirt, just as in love!
body: This is my second shirt from Heml≈çya and I love it just as much as my starling shirt! It fits perfectly (no gaps!!) and it is so soft and comfy. Perfect work or date night shirt ü•∞

author: Amanda Mitchell
title: Gorgeous, gorgeous, GORGEOUS!
body: I saw this shirt in an ad online and fell in love immediately with the pattern. I got it in the mail today and it‚Äôs even better in person than the pictures online! I‚Äôm trying to step up my clothing game a little, and I can‚Äôt wait to wear this to work! I think it‚Äôll look great dressed up or dressed down!

author: Abby
title: Love this top!
body: I love this top and I love supporting a small business.

author: Stephanie Orme
title: An instant must-have!
body: Sometimes you see a shirt and you're instantly like, "I have to own that!" That was me when I saw this gorgeous print. (I adore sterlings, for one). The design really pops in person. The shirt itself is high quality and has a luxurious feel to it. I like that I can wear it for work or just casually. Would definitely recommend!

author: Alexandria
title: Love this shirt!
body: Absolutely love the shirt, its even better in person.Read more

author: C.F.
title: Perfect
body:
This shirt caught my eye - love at first sight!
I ordered it immediately from the other side of the planet. After long weeks of waiting (lost parcel), long exchanges with Samiha (extraordinarily available) who was struggling with the French post office to find my parcel... I received this beauty!
Thank you for everything: the design, the colors, the material and the good mood...Read more

author: Sarah Yuster
title: A perfect gift for my daughter!
body: The Forest shirt was a gift for my biologist/ecologist daughter. She called me nearly moved to tears when it arrived to tell me how much she loved it. Shes always loved colorful, quirky, feminine clothing and this ticked all those boxes along with the artful, accurate images of the tree frogs and poison frogs (both of which she studied in the field). The mushrooms and greenery add to the design and spectrum. Very happy to have found Hemloya!Read more

author: Jordan Williams
title: BUGSSSSü™≤
body: This shirt is without a doubt the greatest thing I‚Äôve ever worn! I love the material, design, and bold colors. I ordered the large I‚Äôm 5‚Äô5‚Äù and it‚Äôs still got a tailored fit. Sleeves stop half way down my bicep and shirt stops maybe 6 inches down from my hips so definitely size up.  Most of all I‚Äôm really happy with how helpful and responsive Samiha has been!Read more

author: Rebekah
title: @rffaubion Rebekah looking gorgeous wearing Starling button up!
body: Thank you for sharing this Rebekah!Read more

author: Christina Hamill
title: Love it!
body: This is my second shirt from this shop and I love it! The ladybug pattern is so cute! I love how bright and vibrant the colors are. I really like the feel of the fabric and how it's comfortable in the Texas heat. Thank you!Read more

author: R.M.
title: Stunning!
body: This color and print is so vibrant! I love the way it looks and fits, makes me feel beautiful. I bought this after purchasing one of the other button ups because I love them so much (I also bought two others, so I now have 4 total) - that‚Äôs how much I love these buttons ups!Read more

author: R.M.
title: AMAZING!
body:
This blouse is a beautifully designed dream to wear! The fabric feels like butter and the fit is perfect. Definitely size up, but it fitted in just the right spots and then nice and loose where you need it to be. I can already tell I will be living in this blouse all year round and I can‚Äôt wait to style it in so many different ways. 

When my blouse arrived, I immediately bought three more in the other designs because it‚Äôs just such a beautiful piece of art that you can also wear! I feel so happy and beautiful in this blouse!Read more

body: The starling design and fabric will turn heads! I loved the dress so much I bought the blouse!!Read more

body: I just received this and haven‚Äôt even worn it out of the house yet. The fit is spot on (not billowy but tailored), the fabric is luscious & substantial so it will hold its shape, and the print is delightful. It feels good. My husband thinks it‚Äôs awesome, too. Thank you for your commitment to quality!Read more

title: EXCELLENT
body:
My daughter selected two blouses from your collection. They are beautiful, look beautiful on her and the quality is excellent. 
    I will be purchasing more from you in the future.Read more

title: wonderful shirt
body:
unique beautiful shirt
    excellent customer service when i needed to exchange sizes!Read more

author: TM Mem
title: New favorite tops
body:
The colors are as vibrant as you see in the photos, the material is soft and shiny and the tops are so well made. More than all that - the designs are whimsical, bold, fun. The way the fabric, cut/shape and gorgeous designs come together always boosts my confidence when I wear them! Perfect under a suit for a professional meeting; equally fun with jeans for lunch with friends. Thank you, Hemloya :)
One tip: size up if you don‚Äôt want it to look super-fitted. Normally I‚Äôm an XS in tops, but purchased all in size M.Read more

title: Bought for a gift but confident she will love it
body: My daughter's name is Starling, so when I saw this beautiful starling print I knew it would be perfect for her.  We are vegan, so I appreciate that this shirt doesn't contain silk from caterpillars.  I sized up based on other reviews and judging by how it fit me it will be perfect on her.  I am excited to give her a high-quality, unique piece like this to add to her wardrobe and wear for years to come.Read more

author: Hannah Ainsworth
title: Beautiful shirt and great fit!
body: Shirt print is as gorgeous in person as it looks online. Fabric is a good weight (not too thin) and looks well made (I feel like it will hold up for a long time). Shirt has a nice tailored look that remains crisp the whole day (thanks to fabric quality). Do follow the sizing guide. Based on sizing guide (and suggestions to size up), I bought a medium, despite usually being a XS or S in more mainstream brands. Medium was perfect fit. Highly recommend!Read more

author: E.T.
title: Pretty, but not busty-girl friendly :(
body:
First off, the print is vibrant and beautiful and it feels very high quality. The cut of it is very feminine and flattering. Despite what I‚Äôm about to say, I‚Äôm going to keep it since I love it so much and want to make it work.

I wear a 16/18 in most clothes, so I got a XXL to be safe (I also looked at the size chart). Unfortunately, this top has the problem most women‚Äôs button ups do: the bust!

I‚Äôm a DD, and even in my least padded and most constricting bra, I still get the ‚Äúgap‚Äù when buttoning up, since it can‚Äôt stretch over my chest. It‚Äôs not so tight that the shirt will rip off if I flex, but it‚Äôs noticeable and will have to be pinned to be wearable.

If you‚Äôve got a big chest, be careful. I hope women‚Äôs button ups start adding more buttons over the chest :(Read more

author: Nicole Rand
title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!

Shes always loved colorful, quirky, feminine clothing and this ticked all those boxes along with the artful, accurate images of the tree frogs and poison frogs (both of which she studied in the field). The mushrooms and greenery add to the design and spectrum. Very happy to have found Hemloya!Read more

body: This is my second shirt from Heml≈çya and I love it just as much as my starling shirt! It fits perfectly (no gaps!!) and it is so soft and comfy. Perfect work or date night shirt ü•∞

author: Amanda Mitchell
title: Gorgeous, gorgeous, GORGEOUS!
body: I saw this shirt in an ad online and fell in love immediately with the pattern. I got it in the mail today and it‚Äôs even better in person than the pictures online! I‚Äôm trying to step up my clothing game a little, and I can‚Äôt wait to wear this to work! I think it‚Äôll look great dressed up or dressed down!

author: Abby
title: Love this top!
body: I love this top and I love supporting a small business.

author: Stephanie Orme
title: An instant must-have!
body: Sometimes you see a shirt and you're instantly like, "I have to own that!" That was me when I saw this gorgeous print. (I adore sterlings, for one). The design really pops in person. The shirt itself is high quality and has a luxurious feel to it. I like that I can wear it for work or just casually. Would definitely recommend!

author: Nicole Rand
title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!Read more

author: Alexandria
title: Love this shirt!
body: Absolutely love the shirt, its even better in person.Read more

author: C.F.
title: Perfect
body:
This shirt caught my eye - love at first sight!
I ordered it immediately from the other side of the planet. After long weeks of waiting (lost parcel), long exchanges with Samiha (extraordinarily available) who was struggling with the French post office to find my parcel... I received this beauty!
Thank you for everything: the design, the colors, the material and the good mood...Read more

author: Sarah Yuster
title: A perfect gift for my daughter!
body: The Forest shirt was a gift for my biologist/ecologist daughter. She called me nearly moved to tears when it arrived to tell me how much she loved it. Shes always loved colorful, quirky, feminine clothing and this ticked all those boxes along with the artful, accurate images of the tree frogs and poison frogs (both of which she studied in the field). The mushrooms and greenery add to the design and spectrum. Very happy to have found Hemloya!Read more

author: Jordan Williams
title: BUGSSSSü™≤
body: This shirt is without a doubt the greatest thing I‚Äôve ever worn! I love the material, design, and bold colors. I ordered the large I‚Äôm 5‚Äô5‚Äù and it‚Äôs still got a tailored fit. Sleeves stop half way down my bicep and shirt stops maybe 6 inches down from my hips so definitely size up.  Most of all I‚Äôm really happy with how helpful and responsive Samiha has been!Read more

author: Rebekah
title: @rffaubion Rebekah looking gorgeous wearing Starling button up!
body: Thank you for sharing this Rebekah!Read more

author: Christina Hamill
title: Love it!
body: This is my second shirt from this shop and I love it! The ladybug pattern is so cute! I love how bright and vibrant the colors are. I really like the feel of the fabric and how it's comfortable in the Texas heat. Thank you!Read more

author: R.M.
title: Stunning!
body: This color and print is so vibrant! I love the way it looks and fits, makes me feel beautiful. I bought this after purchasing one of the other button ups because I love them so much (I also bought two others, so I now have 4 total) - that‚Äôs how much I love these buttons ups!Read more

author: R.M.
title: AMAZING!
body:
This blouse is a beautifully designed dream to wear! The fabric feels like butter and the fit is perfect. Definitely size up, but it fitted in just the right spots and then nice and loose where you need it to be. I can already tell I will be living in this blouse all year round and I can‚Äôt wait to style it in so many different ways. 

When my blouse arrived, I immediately bought three more in the other designs because it‚Äôs just such a beautiful piece of art that you can also wear! I feel so happy and beautiful in this blouse!Read more

author: Anne O
body: The starling design and fabric will turn heads! I loved the dress so much I bought the blouse!!Read more

author: Rebecca Woolam
title: Gorgeous!
body: Absolutely gorgeous blouse! Makes the work-day that much better when I can wear such a unique piece! Received numerous compliments. Quality material and arrived fast! Don‚Äôt hesitate to order!Read more

body: Simone Top - Starling BirdRead more

author: Leslie
title: Gorgeous.
body: I just received this and haven‚Äôt even worn it out of the house yet. The fit is spot on (not billowy but tailored), the fabric is luscious & substantial so it will hold its shape, and the print is delightful. It feels good. My husband thinks it‚Äôs awesome, too. Thank you for your commitment to quality!Read more

body: I love this shirt! It is not my first purchase. Previously I bought my niece this pattern but short sleeves and I have coveted it since. The quality is really nice, I love the little buttons and wearing it just makes me feel good.Read more

title: Love this blouse
body: Everything about this blouse is fabulous -- from the way it is packaged with a personal note to the quality of the fabric and the way it is constructed.Read more

title: Lana top
body: Sharp and super cute! Absolutely adore the starling print. Fits great and the classic cut with the unique pattern will work wirh funky casual or more conservative "office-appropriate" outfits. Can't wait to style this piece!Read more

title: EXCELLENT
body:
My daughter selected two blouses from your collection. They are beautiful, look beautiful on her and the quality is excellent. 
    I will be purchasing more from you in the future.Read more

author: Lisa Barsotti
title: wonderful shirt
body:
unique beautiful shirt
    excellent customer service when i needed to exchange sizes!Read more

author: TM Mem
title: New favorite tops
body:
The colors are as vibrant as you see in the photos, the material is soft and shiny and the tops are so well made. More than all that - the designs are whimsical, bold, fun. The way the fabric, cut/shape and gorgeous designs come together always boosts my confidence when I wear them! Perfect under a suit for a professional meeting; equally fun with jeans for lunch with friends. Thank you, Hemloya :)
One tip: size up if you don‚Äôt want it to look super-fitted. Normally I‚Äôm an XS in tops, but purchased all in size M.Read more

author: Bethy Turton
body: Simone Top - HummingbirdRead more

author: Madeline Tollefson
title: Lana top- butterfly
body: Great with Jeans, & can be worn with dressy black Leather pants!  My hubb really likes it too!Read more

author: Theresa L
title: So fun and flattering!
body: I really loved the unique design and color of this shirt. I wasn‚Äôt sure how it would look on me but once it arrived I fell in love!! It really fits my style and personality. It also brings out my confidence :). I am so happy with this purchase!Read more

author: Kaety Byerley
title: Gorgeous shirt!
body: I rarely buy anything I can't feel or try on but when I saw this shirt on IG I just went for it. I am so happy I did! It's a nice, light satin fabric, and it's well-sewn. I ordered a medium and it fits perfectly ( I am usually between a S and M, 36C). Wore it once so far and got tons of compliments!Read more

author: Anonymous
title: So Unique and Fun!
body: Love this shirt - the artwork and fabric are both exceptional. I am glad I followed the advice of other customers and took my measurements before ordering to ensure a perfect fit. This is truly a one of a kind shirt and is a delight to wear; perfect for dressing up with a jacket or going casual with jeans. I‚Äôll definitely be getting another  design!Read more

author: Amanda Banik
body: Very well crafted, unique shirt. Fits perfectly!Read more

author: Lisa Parisi
title: Love it! üòç
body: Such a beautiful print and perfect fit!Read more

author: Hannah Ainsworth
title: Beautiful shirt and great fit!
body: Shirt print is as gorgeous in person as it looks online. Fabric is a good weight (not too thin) and looks well made (I feel like it will hold up for a long time). Shirt has a nice tailored look that remains crisp the whole day (thanks to fabric quality). Do follow the sizing guide. Based on sizing guide (and suggestions to size up), I bought a medium, despite usually being a XS or S in more mainstream brands. Medium was perfect fit. Highly recommend!Read more

author: E.T.
title: Pretty, but not busty-girl friendly :(
body:
First off, the print is vibrant and beautiful and it feels very high quality. The cut of it is very feminine and flattering. Despite what I‚Äôm about to say, I‚Äôm going to keep it since I love it so much and want to make it work.

I wear a 16/18 in most clothes, so I got a XXL to be safe (I also looked at the size chart). Unfortunately, this top has the problem most women‚Äôs button ups do: the bust!

I‚Äôm a DD, and even in my least padded and most constricting bra, I still get the ‚Äúgap‚Äù when buttoning up, since it can‚Äôt stretch over my chest. It‚Äôs not so tight that the shirt will rip off if I flex, but it‚Äôs noticeable and will have to be pinned to be wearable.

If you‚Äôve got a big chest, be careful. I hope women‚Äôs button ups start adding more buttons over the chest :(Read more

author: Eileen Reis
title: Fantastic Shirt
body: Just a glorious creation, this beautiful starling shirt!  Unique, comfortable, artfully crafted and dramatically beautiful.  Laundered like a dream - no ironing needed. I stand 4' 10" at 108 lbs - the small fits to perfection.Read more

author: Denele Sakata
title: Mystical
body: This shirt is so much fun to wear. Expect compliments and conversation‚Ä¶Read more

title: Worth Every Penny!
body: This shirt is just amazing. The pattern is beautiful and vibrant, and has so much personality, everyone comments on how much they love it. The shirt is well made and the satin feel is so nice! I already bought another shirtRead more

body: Love the hummingbird print and the fit.  Also love that it didn‚Äôt shrink in the wash.Read more

body: My one regret is I got a size too small and it doesn't come in a bigger size.Read more

title: Comfy stylish and fulfills bird nerd dreams
body: I adore birds and I wanted more clothes that I could wear for work and giving presentations. This shirt fits the bill and I can't wait to wear it all the time! Fit is true to size.Read more

author: Heidi Loftis
title: Currently my favorite shirt
body: I love this shirt so much!! I wear it once a week. Plan to order a few more shirts to keep on my rotation.Read more

author: Samantha Magrath
title: Bought for a gift but confident she will love it
body: My daughter's name is Starling, so when I saw this beautiful starling print I knew it would be perfect for her.  We are vegan, so I appreciate that this shirt doesn't contain silk from caterpillars.  I sized up based on other reviews and judging by how it fit me it will be perfect on her.  I am excited to give her a high-quality, unique piece like this to add to her wardrobe and wear for years to come.Read more

author: Samantha Schroller
title: Super cute, ordered a size up!
body: I love this top and get tons of compliments. Following other reviews, I ordered an XL when I normally wear a medium or a large. I'm 5'8 and 180#Read more

author: Giovanna Torres Reyes
title: Favorite shirt
body: I absolutely love everything about this shirt, the fit the, material, quality, the design that is so attuned with my favorite book the starling house! I absolutely love it!Read more

author: Gini Mascorro
body: Starling Bird Button Up ShirtRead more

author: Rachel Rollins
title: Love it
body: I‚Äôve already gotten compliments on this shirt.  The quality is great and I love the fun patternRead more

author: Sara E Clark
title: Starling shirt
body: Oops! Called this shirt the crow shirt. I keep thinking that are crows until I look closer. Lol! Sorry! Beautiful, comfortable, excellent made shirt. I love it!Read more

author: Wendy Turgeon
title: vibrant and beautiful print
body: I love Hemloya shirts because not only are the silky but washable but the prints are so charming and unique.  I have three of them now!Read more

author: Wendy Turgeon
title: Great print
body: What a unique shirt and hand made.  I have several of these short sleeve shirts because the prints are so arresting. Definitely a special shirt and worth it!Read more

author: Stacey Moore
title: Fit, shipping & quality - ALL FAB!
body:
Can I just tell you my shirt is FABULOUS.  I am thrilled with it and so happy to have found you all!  Fit is perfect - I'm usually a large but your sizing showed the model as L but wearing XL so I got the XL and it's perfect.
    It said 2-3 week delivery time and it came in less than a week...so thanks for being YOU!!!!Read more

author: Elizabeth Fessenden
title: Thrilled!
body: I got this for an event and couldn‚Äôt be happier! Shipping time, customer service, quality, and fit were all 10/10. Excited to have a new favorite in my closet. Thank you!Read more

author: Kristen Campbell
title: Love this look!
body: Handcrafted, so soft, so cute!Read more

author: Kasie Roads
title: Gorgeous shirt- great fit! Excellent customer service
body: I love the beautiful clothing from Hemloya! The pieces are so unique and really stand out. The customer service is also outstanding. You can tell much care and thoughtfulness goes into their designs and that they deeply value their customers having a great experience.Read more

author: Aubrey Green
title: One of my favorite shirts!
body:
I‚Äôve had this shirt pinned on my Pinterest for a handful of years now and finally came around to purchasing it. I sized up two sizes than what I‚Äôd normally buy based on a few other reviews and wanting a little breathing room, and it ended up fitting just right. As someone who adores entomology and nature, I can‚Äôt gush enough about how beautiful it is! The art is so vibrant and the material is light with a silky feel. I‚Äôve only worn it a few times, but I imagine there will be many more compliments to come. 

I will be purchasing again in the future!Read more

author: Leanne
title: So joyful!
body: The happiest shirt in my closet! So soft and comfortable to wearRead more

title: The cutest ladybug print!
body: I love ladybugs and this print makes me happy! Everytime I've worn it, I've received so many compliments!Read more

body:
This shirt is more beautiful than the photos allow.  Material feels great against the skin.
    Very happy with purchase.
    Laura Turner.
    South CarolinaRead more

title: What a great top

author: Amanda Cruz
title: So many compliments!
body: I wore this to a work function and it was a conversation piece.  I love it. It‚Äôs not only beautiful and comfortable but also very well made. I was surprised to find it‚Äôs a silky fabric. I thought it was cotton. The silkiness is nice though because you can dress it up or down.Read more

author: Carrie McCarter
title: Beautiful
body: Looks even better in person. Silky feeling material.Read more

author: Nicole Rand
title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!

author: TM Mem
title: New favorite tops
body:
The colors are as vibrant as you see in the photos, the material is soft and shiny and the tops are so well made. More than all that - the designs are whimsical, bold, fun. The way the fabric, cut/shape and gorgeous designs come together always boosts my confidence when I wear them! Perfect under a suit for a professional meeting; equally fun with jeans for lunch with friends. Thank you, Hemloya :)
One tip: size up if you don‚Äôt want it to look super-fitted. Normally I‚Äôm an XS in tops, but purchased all in size M.Read more

title: So fun and flattering!

author: Kaety Byerley
title: Gorgeous shirt!
body: I rarely buy anything I can't feel or try on but when I saw this shirt on IG I just went for it. I am so happy I did! It's a nice, light satin fabric, and it's well-sewn. I ordered a medium and it fits perfectly ( I am usually between a S and M, 36C). Wore it once so far and got tons of compliments!Read more

author: Anonymous
title: So Unique and Fun!
body: Love this shirt - the artwork and fabric are both exceptional. I am glad I followed the advice of other customers and took my measurements before ordering to ensure a perfect fit. This is truly a one of a kind shirt and is a delight to wear; perfect for dressing up with a jacket or going casual with jeans. I‚Äôll definitely be getting another  design!Read more

author: Amanda Banik
body: Very well crafted, unique shirt. Fits perfectly!Read more

author: Lisa Parisi
title: Love it! üòç
body: Such a beautiful print and perfect fit!Read more

author: Hannah Ainsworth
title: Beautiful shirt and great fit!
body: Shirt print is as gorgeous in person as it looks online. Fabric is a good weight (not too thin) and looks well made (I feel like it will hold up for a long time). Shirt has a nice tailored look that remains crisp the whole day (thanks to fabric quality). Do follow the sizing guide. Based on sizing guide (and suggestions to size up), I bought a medium, despite usually being a XS or S in more mainstream brands. Medium was perfect fit. Highly recommend!Read more

author: E.T.
title: Pretty, but not busty-girl friendly :(
body:
First off, the print is vibrant and beautiful and it feels very high quality. The cut of it is very feminine and flattering. Despite what I‚Äôm about to say, I‚Äôm going to keep it since I love it so much and want to make it work.

I wear a 16/18 in most clothes, so I got a XXL to be safe (I also looked at the size chart). Unfortunately, this top has the problem most women‚Äôs button ups do: the bust!

I‚Äôm a DD, and even in my least padded and most constricting bra, I still get the ‚Äúgap‚Äù when buttoning up, since it can‚Äôt stretch over my chest. It‚Äôs not so tight that the shirt will rip off if I flex, but it‚Äôs noticeable and will have to be pinned to be wearable.

If you‚Äôve got a big chest, be careful. I hope women‚Äôs button ups start adding more buttons over the chest :(Read more

author: Eileen Reis
title: Fantastic Shirt
body: Just a glorious creation, this beautiful starling shirt!  Unique, comfortable, artfully crafted and dramatically beautiful.  Laundered like a dream - no ironing needed. I stand 4' 10" at 108 lbs - the small fits to perfection.Read more

author: Samantha Magrath
title: Bought for a gift but confident she will love it
body: My daughter's name is Starling, so when I saw this beautiful starling print I knew it would be perfect for her.  We are vegan, so I appreciate that this shirt doesn't contain silk from caterpillars.  I sized up based on other reviews and judging by how it fit me it will be perfect on her.  I am excited to give her a high-quality, unique piece like this to add to her wardrobe and wear for years to come.Read more

title: Fit, shipping & quality - ALL FAB!
body:
Can I just tell you my shirt is FABULOUS.  I am thrilled with it and so happy to have found you all!  Fit is perfect - I'm usually a large but your sizing showed the model as L but wearing XL so I got the XL and it's perfect.
    It said 2-3 week delivery time and it came in less than a week...so thanks for being YOU!!!!Read more

title: Gorgeous shirt- great fit! Excellent customer service

author: Aubrey Green
title: One of my favorite shirts!
body:
I‚Äôve had this shirt pinned on my Pinterest for a handful of years now and finally came around to purchasing it. I sized up two sizes than what I‚Äôd normally buy based on a few other reviews and wanting a little breathing room, and it ended up fitting just right. As someone who adores entomology and nature, I can‚Äôt gush enough about how beautiful it is! The art is so vibrant and the material is light with a silky feel. I‚Äôve only worn it a few times, but I imagine there will be many more compliments to come. 

I will be purchasing again in the future!Read more

title: Gorgeous print!
body: I saw this shirt on Instagram and immediately knew I had to have it. I'm in-between sizes so I sized up for a Large - no regrets. The fit is great. My only complaint is the level of static cling, but that's easily fixed with some spray. It washed well also.Read more

title: Unique blouse

author: Suzanne Reichner
title: Starlings darling
body: This shirt is comfortable, gorgeous and just what I needed. I have received many compliments while wearing this shirt. 10/10 perfect for my wardrobe!Read more

author: Nicole Rand
title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!

author: Andrea Kelley
title: Second shirt, just as in love!
body: This is my second shirt from Heml≈çya and I love it just as much as my starling shirt! It fits perfectly (no gaps!!) and it is so soft and comfy. Perfect work or date night shirt ü•∞

title: Gorgeous, gorgeous, GORGEOUS!
body: I saw this shirt in an ad online and fell in love immediately with the pattern. I got it in the mail today and it‚Äôs even better in person than the pictures online! I‚Äôm trying to step up my clothing game a little, and I can‚Äôt wait to wear this to work! I think it‚Äôll look great dressed up or dressed down!

body: Absolutely love the shirt, its even better in person.Read more

author: C.F.
title: Perfect
body:
This shirt caught my eye - love at first sight!
I ordered it immediately from the other side of the planet. After long weeks of waiting (lost parcel), long exchanges with Samiha (extraordinarily available) who was struggling with the French post office to find my parcel... I received this beauty!
Thank you for everything: the design, the colors, the material and the good mood...Read more

author: Sarah Yuster
title: A perfect gift for my daughter!
body: The Forest shirt was a gift for my biologist/ecologist daughter. She called me nearly moved to tears when it arrived to tell me how much she loved it. Shes always loved colorful, quirky, feminine clothing and this ticked all those boxes along with the artful, accurate images of the tree frogs and poison frogs (both of which she studied in the field). The mushrooms and greenery add to the design and spectrum. Very happy to have found Hemloya!Read more

author: Jordan Williams
title: BUGSSSSü™≤
body: This shirt is without a doubt the greatest thing I‚Äôve ever worn! I love the material, design, and bold colors. I ordered the large I‚Äôm 5‚Äô5‚Äù and it‚Äôs still got a tailored fit. Sleeves stop half way down my bicep and shirt stops maybe 6 inches down from my hips so definitely size up.  Most of all I‚Äôm really happy with how helpful and responsive Samiha has been!Read more

author: R.M.
title: Stunning!
body: This color and print is so vibrant! I love the way it looks and fits, makes me feel beautiful. I bought this after purchasing one of the other button ups because I love them so much (I also bought two others, so I now have 4 total) - that‚Äôs how much I love these buttons ups!Read more

author: R.M.
title: AMAZING!
body:
This blouse is a beautifully designed dream to wear! The fabric feels like butter and the fit is perfect. Definitely size up, but it fitted in just the right spots and then nice and loose where you need it to be. I can already tell I will be living in this blouse all year round and I can‚Äôt wait to style it in so many different ways. 

When my blouse arrived, I immediately bought three more in the other designs because it‚Äôs just such a beautiful piece of art that you can also wear! I feel so happy and beautiful in this blouse!Read more

author: Nicole Rand
title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!

title: Perfect
body:
This shirt caught my eye - love at first sight!

author: Sarah Yuster
title: A perfect gift for my daughter!
body: The Forest shirt was a gift for my biologist/ecologist daughter. She called me nearly moved to tears when it arrived to tell me how much she loved it. Shes always loved colorful, quirky, feminine clothing and this ticked all those boxes along with the artful, accurate images of the tree frogs and poison frogs (both of which she studied in the field). The mushrooms and greenery add to the design and spectrum. Very happy to have found Hemloya!Read more

Shirt has a nice tailored look that remains crisp the whole day (thanks to fabric quality). Do follow the sizing guide. Based on sizing guide (and suggestions to size up), I bought a medium, despite usually being a XS or S in more mainstream brands. Medium was perfect fit. Highly recommend!Read more

author: E.T.
title: Pretty, but not busty-girl friendly :(
body:
First off, the print is vibrant and beautiful and it feels very high quality. The cut of it is very feminine and flattering. Despite what I‚Äôm about to say, I‚Äôm going to keep it since I love it so much and want to make it work.

I wear a 16/18 in most clothes, so I got a XXL to be safe (I also looked at the size chart). Unfortunately, this top has the problem most women‚Äôs button ups do: the bust!

I‚Äôm a DD, and even in my least padded and most constricting bra, I still get the ‚Äúgap‚Äù when buttoning up, since it can‚Äôt stretch over my chest. It‚Äôs not so tight that the shirt will rip off if I flex, but it‚Äôs noticeable and will have to be pinned to be wearable.

If you‚Äôve got a big chest, be careful. I hope women‚Äôs button ups start adding more buttons over the chest :(Read more

title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!

author: Andrea Kelley
title: Second shirt, just as in love!
body: This is my second shirt from Heml≈çya and I love it just as much as my starling shirt! It fits perfectly (no gaps!!) and it is so soft and comfy. Perfect work or date night shirt ü•∞

title: Gorgeous, gorgeous, GORGEOUS!
body: I saw this shirt in an ad online and fell in love immediately with the pattern. I got it in the mail today and it‚Äôs even better in person than the pictures online! I‚Äôm trying to step up my clothing game a little, and I can‚Äôt wait to wear this to work! I think it‚Äôll look great dressed up or dressed down!

author: C.F.
title: Perfect
body:
This shirt caught my eye - love at first sight!
I ordered it immediately from the other side of the planet. After long weeks of waiting (lost parcel), long exchanges with Samiha (extraordinarily available) who was struggling with the French post office to find my parcel... I received this beauty!
Thank you for everything: the design, the colors, the material and the good mood...Read more

author: Sarah Yuster
title: A perfect gift for my daughter!
body: The Forest shirt was a gift for my biologist/ecologist daughter. She called me nearly moved to tears when it arrived to tell me how much she loved it. Shes always loved colorful, quirky, feminine clothing and this ticked all those boxes along with the artful, accurate images of the tree frogs and poison frogs (both of which she studied in the field). The mushrooms and greenery add to the design and spectrum. Very happy to have found Hemloya!Read more

author: Jordan Williams
title: BUGSSSSü™≤
body: This shirt is without a doubt the greatest thing I‚Äôve ever worn! I love the material, design, and bold colors. I ordered the large I‚Äôm 5‚Äô5‚Äù and it‚Äôs still got a tailored fit. Sleeves stop half way down my bicep and shirt stops maybe 6 inches down from my hips so definitely size up.  Most of all I‚Äôm really happy with how helpful and responsive Samiha has been!Read more

author: R.M.
title: Stunning!
body: This color and print is so vibrant! I love the way it looks and fits, makes me feel beautiful. I bought this after purchasing one of the other button ups because I love them so much (I also bought two others, so I now have 4 total) - that‚Äôs how much I love these buttons ups!Read more

title: AMAZING!
body:
This blouse is a beautifully designed dream to wear! The fabric feels like butter and the fit is perfect. Definitely size up, but it fitted in just the right spots and then nice and loose where you need it to be. I can already tell I will be living in this blouse all year round and I can‚Äôt wait to style it in so many different ways. 

When my blouse arrived, I immediately bought three more in the other designs because it‚Äôs just such a beautiful piece of art that you can also wear! I feel so happy and beautiful in this blouse!Read more

title: New favorite tops
body:
The colors are as vibrant as you see in the photos, the material is soft and shiny and the tops are so well made. More than all that - the designs are whimsical, bold, fun. The way the fabric, cut/shape and gorgeous designs come together always boosts my confidence when I wear them! Perfect under a suit for a professional meeting; equally fun with jeans for lunch with friends. Thank you, Hemloya :)
One tip: size up if you don‚Äôt want it to look super-fitted. Normally I‚Äôm an XS in tops, but purchased all in size M.Read more

title: Gorgeous shirt!
body: I rarely buy anything I can't feel or try on but when I saw this shirt on IG I just went for it. I am so happy I did! It's a nice, light satin fabric, and it's well-sewn. I ordered a medium and it fits perfectly ( I am usually between a S and M, 36C). Wore it once so far and got tons of compliments!Read more

body: Love this shirt - the artwork and fabric are both exceptional. I am glad I followed the advice of other customers and took my measurements before ordering to ensure a perfect fit. This is truly a one of a kind shirt and is a delight to wear; perfect for dressing up with a jacket or going casual with jeans. I‚Äôll definitely be getting another  design!Read more

author: Hannah Ainsworth
title: Beautiful shirt and great fit!
body: Shirt print is as gorgeous in person as it looks online. Fabric is a good weight (not too thin) and looks well made (I feel like it will hold up for a long time). Shirt has a nice tailored look that remains crisp the whole day (thanks to fabric quality). Do follow the sizing guide. Based on sizing guide (and suggestions to size up), I bought a medium, despite usually being a XS or S in more mainstream brands. Medium was perfect fit. Highly recommend!Read more

author: E.T.
title: Pretty, but not busty-girl friendly :(
body:
First off, the print is vibrant and beautiful and it feels very high quality. The cut of it is very feminine and flattering. Despite what I‚Äôm about to say, I‚Äôm going to keep it since I love it so much and want to make it work.

I wear a 16/18 in most clothes, so I got a XXL to be safe (I also looked at the size chart). Unfortunately, this top has the problem most women‚Äôs button ups do: the bust!

I‚Äôm a DD, and even in my least padded and most constricting bra, I still get the ‚Äúgap‚Äù when buttoning up, since it can‚Äôt stretch over my chest. It‚Äôs not so tight that the shirt will rip off if I flex, but it‚Äôs noticeable and will have to be pinned to be wearable.

If you‚Äôve got a big chest, be careful. I hope women‚Äôs button ups start adding more buttons over the chest :(Read more

I am excited to give her a high-quality, unique piece like this to add to her wardrobe and wear for years to come.Read more

body:

    It said 2-3 week delivery time and it came in less than a week...so thanks for being YOU!!!!Read more

title: One of my favorite shirts!
body:
I‚Äôve had this shirt pinned on my Pinterest for a handful of years now and finally came around to purchasing it. I sized up two sizes than what I‚Äôd normally buy based on a few other reviews and wanting a little breathing room, and it ended up fitting just right. As someone who adores entomology and nature, I can‚Äôt gush enough about how beautiful it is! The art is so vibrant and the material is light with a silky feel. I‚Äôve only worn it a few times, but I imagine there will be many more compliments to come. 

I will be purchasing again in the future!Read more

title: Silky and Beautiful
body: The cut of this blouse is so cute and flattering, and the patterns are some of the most beautiful available. The themes speak to my naturalist heart and always garner kind comments from strangers. The material itself is cozy - cool and breezy in the summer, easy to layer when cold. I only wish I could afford to buy more at once! But I look forward to every new purchase.Read more

author: M Vigeo
title: Gorgeous shirts!
body: I absolutely love these shirts so much I got multiple prints. I love the bright colors, the soft silky fabric, and they are utterly comfortable. I have worn them each many times and people compliment them quite a lot (especially the bug one). SIZING: I am usually a Medium and ordered an XL due to the reviews and sizing chart and it is a perfect fit - so don't be afraid to go big. The customer service was excellent - the shop owner reached out to me to let me know one of the shirts was out of stock and would be a bit, but shipped the others super quick! Even messaged me again to let me know the one I was waiting on was in and being shipped. Definitely recommend.Read more

author: Nicole Rand
title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!

I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!Read more

The mushrooms and greenery add to the design and spectrum. Very happy to have found Hemloya!Read more

body: Shirt print is as gorgeous in person as it looks online. Fabric is a good weight (not too thin) and looks well made (I feel like it will hold up for a long time). Shirt has a nice tailored look that remains crisp the whole day (thanks to fabric quality). Do follow the sizing guide. Based on sizing guide (and suggestions to size up), I bought a medium, despite usually being a XS or S in more mainstream brands. Medium was perfect fit. Highly recommend!Read more

author: E.T.
title: Pretty, but not busty-girl friendly :(
body:
First off, the print is vibrant and beautiful and it feels very high quality. The cut of it is very feminine and flattering. Despite what I‚Äôm about to say, I‚Äôm going to keep it since I love it so much and want to make it work.

I wear a 16/18 in most clothes, so I got a XXL to be safe (I also looked at the size chart). Unfortunately, this top has the problem most women‚Äôs button ups do: the bust!

I‚Äôm a DD, and even in my least padded and most constricting bra, I still get the ‚Äúgap‚Äù when buttoning up, since it can‚Äôt stretch over my chest. It‚Äôs not so tight that the shirt will rip off if I flex, but it‚Äôs noticeable and will have to be pinned to be wearable.

If you‚Äôve got a big chest, be careful. I hope women‚Äôs button ups start adding more buttons over the chest :(Read more

title: Gorgeous shirts!
body: I absolutely love these shirts so much I got multiple prints. I love the bright colors, the soft silky fabric, and they are utterly comfortable. SIZING: I am usually a Medium and ordered an XL due to the reviews and sizing chart and it is a perfect fit - so don't be afraid to go big. The customer service was excellent - the shop owner reached out to me to let me know one of the shirts was out of stock and would be a bit, but shipped the others super quick! Even messaged me again to let me know the one I was waiting on was in and being shipped. Definitely recommend.Read more

title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!

author: Sarah Yuster
title: A perfect gift for my daughter!
body: The Forest shirt was a gift for my biologist/ecologist daughter. She called me nearly moved to tears when it arrived to tell me how much she loved it. Shes always loved colorful, quirky, feminine clothing and this ticked all those boxes along with the artful, accurate images of the tree frogs and poison frogs (both of which she studied in the field). The mushrooms and greenery add to the design and spectrum. Very happy to have found Hemloya!Read more

Sleeves stop half way down my bicep and shirt stops maybe 6 inches down from my hips so definitely size up.  Most of all I‚Äôm really happy with how helpful and responsive Samiha has been!Read more

author: E.T.
title: Pretty, but not busty-girl friendly :(
body:
First off, the print is vibrant and beautiful and it feels very high quality. The cut of it is very feminine and flattering. Despite what I‚Äôm about to say, I‚Äôm going to keep it since I love it so much and want to make it work.

I wear a 16/18 in most clothes, so I got a XXL to be safe (I also looked at the size chart). Unfortunately, this top has the problem most women‚Äôs button ups do: the bust!

I‚Äôm a DD, and even in my least padded and most constricting bra, I still get the ‚Äúgap‚Äù when buttoning up, since it can‚Äôt stretch over my chest. It‚Äôs not so tight that the shirt will rip off if I flex, but it‚Äôs noticeable and will have to be pinned to be wearable.

If you‚Äôve got a big chest, be careful. I hope women‚Äôs button ups start adding more buttons over the chest :(Read more

title: Gorgeous shirts!
body: I absolutely love these shirts so much I got multiple prints. I love the bright colors, the soft silky fabric, and they are utterly comfortable. I have worn them each many times and people compliment them quite a lot (especially the bug one). SIZING: I am usually a Medium and ordered an XL due to the reviews and sizing chart and it is a perfect fit - so don't be afraid to go big. The customer service was excellent - the shop owner reached out to me to let me know one of the shirts was out of stock and would be a bit, but shipped the others super quick! Even messaged me again to let me know the one I was waiting on was in and being shipped. Definitely recommend.Read more

author: Nicole Mahoney
title: Beautiful fabric, great fit
body: I was unsure if this shirt would fit because I am tall (6‚Äô), but the size was perfect. The fabric is really nice and the design is gorgeous. I‚Äôd love to see more options in the future.Read more

author: Alexandria Urell
body: I ordered this shirt along with the neon bugs print - they're both gorgeous, but this reminded me of a painting in my childhood bedroom and I got ALL the nostalgia. I had my eye on a few designs that would make great gifts for my mom, but I had to vet the company and quality before buying more. Shipping did take a bit, but the FAQ makes that very clear so I wasn't surprised. When my package was lost by the carrier (it happens to everyone), the support I received from the seller was phenomenal. I now have my two shirts, and I am over the moon! They're silky soft, and extremely flattering. Trust the sizing chart for chest measurement - I'm normally a large in women's tops, and the sizing chart said I was an XL. I ordered another size up (2XL) because I was afraid of not being able to wear my gorgeous shirts if they were too tight, and do wish I had gone withthe sizing chart recommendation. That said, even though I ordered a size larger than I was supposed to, the fit is still incredible. Nothing is hugging me tightly, but nothing is so boxy that it's unflattering, just oversized. Based on the feel of the fabric, I'm going to guess these need delicate care, but I know it'll be worth it. My husband pointed it out as soon as I opened my order up and said he loved it - he doesn't weigh in on my buys a lot! 10,000/10 I love this shop and love these designs!Read more

author: Alexandria Urell
title: Yes, it's actually as amazing as it looks
body:
I can't even remember how I found Hemloya, but I know it was because of an ad that had this shirt. I immediately ordered this and the Arcadia Button Up. I had my eye on a few designs that would make great gifts for my mom, but I had to vet the company and quality before buying more. Shipping did take a bit, but the FAQ makes that very clear so I wasn't surprised. When my package was lost by the carrier (it happens to everyone), the support I received from the seller was phenomenal. I now have my two shirts, and I am over the moon! They're silky soft, and extremely flattering. Trust the sizing chart for chest measurement - I'm normally a large in women's tops, and the sizing chart said I was an XL. I ordered another size up (2XL) because I was afraid of not being able to wear my gorgeous shirts if they were too tight, and do wish I had gone withthe sizing chart recommendation. That said, even though I ordered a size larger than I was supposed to, the fit is still incredible. Nothing is hugging me tightly, but nothing is so boxy that it's unflattering, just oversized. Based on the feel of the fabric, I'm going to guess these need delicate care, but I know it'll be worth it.

So, this bug print, right?! I wore this shirt the day I got it, and the first person I saw complimented the shirt immediately. The art is gorgeous, and a high quality with tons of details that really shine on the fabric and with the exciting colors. Because of the range of colors, I can match this with a lot. While I don't frequently need to dress professionally, unless in a staunch environment, I would feel comfortable wearing this with a suit to meet clients. That said, I usually wear it tucked into a pair of jeans! It looks great either way.Read more

author: Eileen Sauer
title: so cute!
body: Going to wear this week - just received in the mail and already thinking of ways to style it. Such great colors and the fit (size medium) is perfect :)Read more

author: Eileen Sauer
title: new favorite
body: Wore this for the first time yesterday and got so so so many compliments on it - sure to be a staple in my wardrobe. Size medium was perfect for me and will definitely be buying more in some of the other beautiful patterns :)Read more

author: Nicole Rand
title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!

title: Perfect
body:

author: Sarah Yuster
title: A perfect gift for my daughter!
body: The Forest shirt was a gift for my biologist/ecologist daughter. She called me nearly moved to tears when it arrived to tell me how much she loved it. Shes always loved colorful, quirky, feminine clothing and this ticked all those boxes along with the artful, accurate images of the tree frogs and poison frogs (both of which she studied in the field). The mushrooms and greenery add to the design and spectrum. Very happy to have found Hemloya!Read more

author: E.T.
title: Pretty, but not busty-girl friendly :(
body:
First off, the print is vibrant and beautiful and it feels very high quality. The cut of it is very feminine and flattering. Despite what I‚Äôm about to say, I‚Äôm going to keep it since I love it so much and want to make it work.

I wear a 16/18 in most clothes, so I got a XXL to be safe (I also looked at the size chart). Unfortunately, this top has the problem most women‚Äôs button ups do: the bust!

I‚Äôm a DD, and even in my least padded and most constricting bra, I still get the ‚Äúgap‚Äù when buttoning up, since it can‚Äôt stretch over my chest. It‚Äôs not so tight that the shirt will rip off if I flex, but it‚Äôs noticeable and will have to be pinned to be wearable.

If you‚Äôve got a big chest, be careful. I hope women‚Äôs button ups start adding more buttons over the chest :(Read more
