title: Gorgeous shirts!
body: I absolutely love these shirts so much I got multiple prints. I love the bright colors, the soft silky fabric, and they are utterly comfortable. I have worn them each many times and people compliment them quite a lot (especially the bug one). SIZING: I am usually a Medium and ordered an XL due to the reviews and sizing chart and it is a perfect fit - so don't be afraid to go big. The customer service was excellent - the shop owner reached out to me to let me know one of the shirts was out of stock and would be a bit, but shipped the others super quick! Even messaged me again to let me know the one I was waiting on was in and being shipped. Definitely recommend.Read more

author: Alexandria Urell
body: I ordered this shirt along with the neon bugs print - they're both gorgeous, but this reminded me of a painting in my childhood bedroom and I got ALL the nostalgia. I had my eye on a few designs that would make great gifts for my mom, but I had to vet the company and quality before buying more. Shipping did take a bit, but the FAQ makes that very clear so I wasn't surprised. When my package was lost by the carrier (it happens to everyone), the support I received from the seller was phenomenal. I now have my two shirts, and I am over the moon! They're silky soft, and extremely flattering. Trust the sizing chart for chest measurement - I'm normally a large in women's tops, and the sizing chart said I was an XL. I ordered another size up (2XL) because I was afraid of not being able to wear my gorgeous shirts if they were too tight, and do wish I had gone withthe sizing chart recommendation. That said, even though I ordered a size larger than I was supposed to, the fit is still incredible. Nothing is hugging me tightly, but nothing is so boxy that it's unflattering, just oversized. Based on the feel of the fabric, I'm going to guess these need delicate care, but I know it'll be worth it. My husband pointed it out as soon as I opened my order up and said he loved it - he doesn't weigh in on my buys a lot! 10,000/10 I love this shop and love these designs!Read more

author: Alexandria Urell
title: Yes, it's actually as amazing as it looks
body:
I can't even remember how I found Hemloya, but I know it was because of an ad that had this shirt. I immediately ordered this and the Arcadia Button Up. I had my eye on a few designs that would make great gifts for my mom, but I had to vet the company and quality before buying more. Shipping did take a bit, but the FAQ makes that very clear so I wasn't surprised. When my package was lost by the carrier (it happens to everyone), the support I received from the seller was phenomenal. I now have my two shirts, and I am over the moon! They're silky soft, and extremely flattering. Trust the sizing chart for chest measurement - I'm normally a large in women's tops, and the sizing chart said I was an XL. I ordered another size up (2XL) because I was afraid of not being able to wear my gorgeous shirts if they were too tight, and do wish I had gone withthe sizing chart recommendation. That said, even though I ordered a size larger than I was supposed to, the fit is still incredible. Nothing is hugging me tightly, but nothing is so boxy that it's unflattering, just oversized. Based on the feel of the fabric, I'm going to guess these need delicate care, but I know it'll be worth it.

So, this bug print, right?! I wore this shirt the day I got it, and the first person I saw complimented the shirt immediately. The art is gorgeous, and a high quality with tons of details that really shine on the fabric and with the exciting colors. Because of the range of colors, I can match this with a lot. While I don't frequently need to dress professionally, unless in a staunch environment, I would feel comfortable wearing this with a suit to meet clients. That said, I usually wear it tucked into a pair of jeans! It looks great either way.Read more

author: Nicole Rand
title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!

title: Pretty, but not busty-girl friendly :(

First off, the print is vibrant and beautiful and it feels very high quality. The cut of it is very feminine and flattering. Despite what I‚Äôm about to say, I‚Äôm going to keep it since I love it so much and want to make it work.

I wear a 16/18 in most clothes, so I got a XXL to be safe (I also looked at the size chart). Unfortunately, this top has the problem most women‚Äôs button ups do: the bust!

I‚Äôm a DD, and even in my least padded and most constricting bra, I still get the ‚Äúgap‚Äù when buttoning up, since it can‚Äôt stretch over my chest. It‚Äôs not so tight that the shirt will rip off if I flex, but it‚Äôs noticeable and will have to be pinned to be wearable.

If you‚Äôve got a big chest, be careful. I hope women‚Äôs button ups start adding more buttons over the chest :(Read more

author: Alexandria Urell
body: I ordered this shirt along with the neon bugs print - they're both gorgeous, but this reminded me of a painting in my childhood bedroom and I got ALL the nostalgia. I had my eye on a few designs that would make great gifts for my mom, but I had to vet the company and quality before buying more. Shipping did take a bit, but the FAQ makes that very clear so I wasn't surprised. When my package was lost by the carrier (it happens to everyone), the support I received from the seller was phenomenal. I now have my two shirts, and I am over the moon! They're silky soft, and extremely flattering. Trust the sizing chart for chest measurement - I'm normally a large in women's tops, and the sizing chart said I was an XL. I ordered another size up (2XL) because I was afraid of not being able to wear my gorgeous shirts if they were too tight, and do wish I had gone withthe sizing chart recommendation. That said, even though I ordered a size larger than I was supposed to, the fit is still incredible. Nothing is hugging me tightly, but nothing is so boxy that it's unflattering, just oversized. Based on the feel of the fabric, I'm going to guess these need delicate care, but I know it'll be worth it. My husband pointed it out as soon as I opened my order up and said he loved it - he doesn't weigh in on my buys a lot! 10,000/10 I love this shop and love these designs!Read more

author: Alexandria Urell
title: Yes, it's actually as amazing as it looks
body:
I can't even remember how I found Hemloya, but I know it was because of an ad that had this shirt. I immediately ordered this and the Arcadia Button Up. I had my eye on a few designs that would make great gifts for my mom, but I had to vet the company and quality before buying more. Shipping did take a bit, but the FAQ makes that very clear so I wasn't surprised. When my package was lost by the carrier (it happens to everyone), the support I received from the seller was phenomenal. I now have my two shirts, and I am over the moon! They're silky soft, and extremely flattering. Trust the sizing chart for chest measurement - I'm normally a large in women's tops, and the sizing chart said I was an XL. I ordered another size up (2XL) because I was afraid of not being able to wear my gorgeous shirts if they were too tight, and do wish I had gone withthe sizing chart recommendation. That said, even though I ordered a size larger than I was supposed to, the fit is still incredible. Nothing is hugging me tightly, but nothing is so boxy that it's unflattering, just oversized. Based on the feel of the fabric, I'm going to guess these need delicate care, but I know it'll be worth it.

So, this bug print, right?! I wore this shirt the day I got it, and the first person I saw complimented the shirt immediately. The art is gorgeous, and a high quality with tons of details that really shine on the fabric and with the exciting colors. Because of the range of colors, I can match this with a lot. While I don't frequently need to dress professionally, unless in a staunch environment, I would feel comfortable wearing this with a suit to meet clients. That said, I usually wear it tucked into a pair of jeans! It looks great either way.Read more

title: Love it!
body: Absolutely beautiful! Will be ordering a couple of the other pieces of art! I went by measurements when ordering my shirt.Read more

author: Nicole Rand
title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!

author: Andrea Kelley
title: Second shirt, just as in love!

author: C.F.
title: Perfect
body:
This shirt caught my eye - love at first sight!
I ordered it immediately from the other side of the planet. After long weeks of waiting (lost parcel), long exchanges with Samiha (extraordinarily available) who was struggling with the French post office to find my parcel... I received this beauty!

author: Sarah Yuster
title: A perfect gift for my daughter!
body: The Forest shirt was a gift for my biologist/ecologist daughter. She called me nearly moved to tears when it arrived to tell me how much she loved it. Shes always loved colorful, quirky, feminine clothing and this ticked all those boxes along with the artful, accurate images of the tree frogs and poison frogs (both of which she studied in the field). The mushrooms and greenery add to the design and spectrum. Very happy to have found Hemloya!Read more

author: Hannah Ainsworth
title: Beautiful shirt and great fit!
body: Shirt print is as gorgeous in person as it looks online. Fabric is a good weight (not too thin) and looks well made (I feel like it will hold up for a long time). Shirt has a nice tailored look that remains crisp the whole day (thanks to fabric quality). Do follow the sizing guide. Based on sizing guide (and suggestions to size up), I bought a medium, despite usually being a XS or S in more mainstream brands. Medium was perfect fit. Highly recommend!Read more

author: E.T.
title: Pretty, but not busty-girl friendly :(
body:
First off, the print is vibrant and beautiful and it feels very high quality. The cut of it is very feminine and flattering. Despite what I‚Äôm about to say, I‚Äôm going to keep it since I love it so much and want to make it work.

I wear a 16/18 in most clothes, so I got a XXL to be safe (I also looked at the size chart). Unfortunately, this top has the problem most women‚Äôs button ups do: the bust!

I‚Äôm a DD, and even in my least padded and most constricting bra, I still get the ‚Äúgap‚Äù when buttoning up, since it can‚Äôt stretch over my chest. It‚Äôs not so tight that the shirt will rip off if I flex, but it‚Äôs noticeable and will have to be pinned to be wearable.

If you‚Äôve got a big chest, be careful. I hope women‚Äôs button ups start adding more buttons over the chest :(Read more

title: Gorgeous shirts!
body: I absolutely love these shirts so much I got multiple prints. I love the bright colors, the soft silky fabric, and they are utterly comfortable. I have worn them each many times and people compliment them quite a lot (especially the bug one). SIZING: I am usually a Medium and ordered an XL due to the reviews and sizing chart and it is a perfect fit - so don't be afraid to go big. The customer service was excellent - the shop owner reached out to me to let me know one of the shirts was out of stock and would be a bit, but shipped the others super quick! Even messaged me again to let me know the one I was waiting on was in and being shipped. Definitely recommend.Read more

author: Alexandria Urell
body: I ordered this shirt along with the neon bugs print - they're both gorgeous, but this reminded me of a painting in my childhood bedroom and I got ALL the nostalgia. I had my eye on a few designs that would make great gifts for my mom, but I had to vet the company and quality before buying more. Shipping did take a bit, but the FAQ makes that very clear so I wasn't surprised. When my package was lost by the carrier (it happens to everyone), the support I received from the seller was phenomenal. I now have my two shirts, and I am over the moon! They're silky soft, and extremely flattering. Trust the sizing chart for chest measurement - I'm normally a large in women's tops, and the sizing chart said I was an XL. I ordered another size up (2XL) because I was afraid of not being able to wear my gorgeous shirts if they were too tight, and do wish I had gone withthe sizing chart recommendation. That said, even though I ordered a size larger than I was supposed to, the fit is still incredible. Nothing is hugging me tightly, but nothing is so boxy that it's unflattering, just oversized. Based on the feel of the fabric, I'm going to guess these need delicate care, but I know it'll be worth it. My husband pointed it out as soon as I opened my order up and said he loved it - he doesn't weigh in on my buys a lot! 10,000/10 I love this shop and love these designs!Read more

author: Alexandria Urell
title: Yes, it's actually as amazing as it looks
body:
I can't even remember how I found Hemloya, but I know it was because of an ad that had this shirt. I immediately ordered this and the Arcadia Button Up. I had my eye on a few designs that would make great gifts for my mom, but I had to vet the company and quality before buying more. Shipping did take a bit, but the FAQ makes that very clear so I wasn't surprised. When my package was lost by the carrier (it happens to everyone), the support I received from the seller was phenomenal. I now have my two shirts, and I am over the moon! They're silky soft, and extremely flattering. Trust the sizing chart for chest measurement - I'm normally a large in women's tops, and the sizing chart said I was an XL. I ordered another size up (2XL) because I was afraid of not being able to wear my gorgeous shirts if they were too tight, and do wish I had gone withthe sizing chart recommendation. That said, even though I ordered a size larger than I was supposed to, the fit is still incredible. Nothing is hugging me tightly, but nothing is so boxy that it's unflattering, just oversized. Based on the feel of the fabric, I'm going to guess these need delicate care, but I know it'll be worth it.

So, this bug print, right?! I wore this shirt the day I got it, and the first person I saw complimented the shirt immediately. The art is gorgeous, and a high quality with tons of details that really shine on the fabric and with the exciting colors. Because of the range of colors, I can match this with a lot. While I don't frequently need to dress professionally, unless in a staunch environment, I would feel comfortable wearing this with a suit to meet clients. That said, I usually wear it tucked into a pair of jeans! It looks great either way.Read more

This is beyond just a gorgeous product - the owner of Hemloya is truly a wonderful soul who has so much love and passion for her business. Ive never received such support and kindness from any other business. I will be ordering these shirts until I have one of every style and color. 10/10, five stars, will recommend Hemloya every single time!!!Read more

author: Nicole Rand
title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!

author: E.T.
title: Pretty, but not busty-girl friendly :(
body:
First off, the print is vibrant and beautiful and it feels very high quality. The cut of it is very feminine and flattering. Despite what I‚Äôm about to say, I‚Äôm going to keep it since I love it so much and want to make it work.

I wear a 16/18 in most clothes, so I got a XXL to be safe (I also looked at the size chart). Unfortunately, this top has the problem most women‚Äôs button ups do: the bust!

I‚Äôm a DD, and even in my least padded and most constricting bra, I still get the ‚Äúgap‚Äù when buttoning up, since it can‚Äôt stretch over my chest. It‚Äôs not so tight that the shirt will rip off if I flex, but it‚Äôs noticeable and will have to be pinned to be wearable.

If you‚Äôve got a big chest, be careful. I hope women‚Äôs button ups start adding more buttons over the chest :(Read more

author: M Vigeo
title: Gorgeous shirts!
body: I absolutely love these shirts so much I got multiple prints. I love the bright colors, the soft silky fabric, and they are utterly comfortable. I have worn them each many times and people compliment them quite a lot (especially the bug one). SIZING: I am usually a Medium and ordered an XL due to the reviews and sizing chart and it is a perfect fit - so don't be afraid to go big. The customer service was excellent - the shop owner reached out to me to let me know one of the shirts was out of stock and would be a bit, but shipped the others super quick! Even messaged me again to let me know the one I was waiting on was in and being shipped. Definitely recommend.Read more

author: Tamika Suttles
title: Soft, comfy, and flattering!
body: Super impressed with these shirts. Theyre extremely soft and comfy on and very flattering. Im generally a size medium and I got an XL to make sure I had room - I dont like things tight. And its perfect.Read more

author: Becca Daniels

body: The shirt is beautiful! They graciously rushed my shirt/shipment to help me get this shirt in time for an event. They were kind, responsive, and quick to reply!Read more

author: Walter P Sullivan
title: I couldn‚Äôt be happier with my purchase!
body: Oh my goodness, I love my bug shirt! The colors are beautiful, quality is great, it‚Äôs comfortable and fits just how I had hoped. (I am 5‚Äô7‚Äù 140lbs, ordered a large for a slightly loser fit.)Read more

author: Carrie Koltko
title: Amazing Print & Fit
body: Sahima is great! The shirts arrived quickly and the print is so much better in person. Will buy again once there are more prints. The fit is also good - I went up a size as I wanted a looser fit.Read more

author: Sarah Feliciano
body: comfortable and cuteRead more

author: Nicole Mahoney
title: Beautiful fabric, great fit
body: I was unsure if this shirt would fit because I am tall (6‚Äô), but the size was perfect. The fabric is really nice and the design is gorgeous. I‚Äôd love to see more options in the future.Read more

author: Alexandria Urell
body: I ordered this shirt along with the neon bugs print - they're both gorgeous, but this reminded me of a painting in my childhood bedroom and I got ALL the nostalgia. I had my eye on a few designs that would make great gifts for my mom, but I had to vet the company and quality before buying more. Shipping did take a bit, but the FAQ makes that very clear so I wasn't surprised. When my package was lost by the carrier (it happens to everyone), the support I received from the seller was phenomenal. I now have my two shirts, and I am over the moon! They're silky soft, and extremely flattering. Trust the sizing chart for chest measurement - I'm normally a large in women's tops, and the sizing chart said I was an XL. I ordered another size up (2XL) because I was afraid of not being able to wear my gorgeous shirts if they were too tight, and do wish I had gone withthe sizing chart recommendation. That said, even though I ordered a size larger than I was supposed to, the fit is still incredible. Nothing is hugging me tightly, but nothing is so boxy that it's unflattering, just oversized. Based on the feel of the fabric, I'm going to guess these need delicate care, but I know it'll be worth it. My husband pointed it out as soon as I opened my order up and said he loved it - he doesn't weigh in on my buys a lot! 10,000/10 I love this shop and love these designs!Read more

author: Alexandria Urell
title: Yes, it's actually as amazing as it looks
body:
I can't even remember how I found Hemloya, but I know it was because of an ad that had this shirt. I immediately ordered this and the Arcadia Button Up. I had my eye on a few designs that would make great gifts for my mom, but I had to vet the company and quality before buying more. Shipping did take a bit, but the FAQ makes that very clear so I wasn't surprised. When my package was lost by the carrier (it happens to everyone), the support I received from the seller was phenomenal. I now have my two shirts, and I am over the moon! They're silky soft, and extremely flattering. Trust the sizing chart for chest measurement - I'm normally a large in women's tops, and the sizing chart said I was an XL. I ordered another size up (2XL) because I was afraid of not being able to wear my gorgeous shirts if they were too tight, and do wish I had gone withthe sizing chart recommendation. That said, even though I ordered a size larger than I was supposed to, the fit is still incredible. Nothing is hugging me tightly, but nothing is so boxy that it's unflattering, just oversized. Based on the feel of the fabric, I'm going to guess these need delicate care, but I know it'll be worth it.

So, this bug print, right?! I wore this shirt the day I got it, and the first person I saw complimented the shirt immediately. The art is gorgeous, and a high quality with tons of details that really shine on the fabric and with the exciting colors. Because of the range of colors, I can match this with a lot. While I don't frequently need to dress professionally, unless in a staunch environment, I would feel comfortable wearing this with a suit to meet clients. That said, I usually wear it tucked into a pair of jeans! It looks great either way.Read more

author: Eileen Sauer

title: Blown away!
body: Im blown away by the quality and beauty of the shirts I ordered from Hemloya! Theyre STUNNING! Additionally, the customer service was astounding- I ordered the incorrect size and she took so much time and care talking with me, asking about my needs, and making recommendations for the best fit for my measurements. This is beyond just a gorgeous product - the owner of Hemloya is truly a wonderful soul who has so much love and passion for her business. Ive never received such support and kindness from any other business. I will be ordering these shirts until I have one of every style and color. 10/10, five stars, will recommend Hemloya every single time!!!Read more

title: A bird lover's dream!

I needed a larger size, because I have a large chest so I reached out to the owner and she was so quick to answer all my questions! She was so nice! Thank you!Read more

title: Great shirt! Exactly as pictured and fits...
body: Great shirt! Exactly as pictured and fits as expected. I would buy again!Read more

author: Nicole Rand
title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!

author: C.F.
title: Perfect
body:
This shirt caught my eye - love at first sight!
I ordered it immediately from the other side of the planet. After long weeks of waiting (lost parcel), long exchanges with Samiha (extraordinarily available) who was struggling with the French post office to find my parcel... I received this beauty!
Thank you for everything: the design, the colors, the material and the good mood...Read more

author: Sarah Yuster
title: A perfect gift for my daughter!
body: The Forest shirt was a gift for my biologist/ecologist daughter. She called me nearly moved to tears when it arrived to tell me how much she loved it. Shes always loved colorful, quirky, feminine clothing and this ticked all those boxes along with the artful, accurate images of the tree frogs and poison frogs (both of which she studied in the field). The mushrooms and greenery add to the design and spectrum. Very happy to have found Hemloya!Read more

Sleeves stop half way down my bicep and shirt stops maybe 6 inches down from my hips so definitely size up.  Most of all I‚Äôm really happy with how helpful and responsive Samiha has been!Read more

I can already tell I will be living in this blouse all year round and I can‚Äôt wait to style it in so many different ways. 

When my blouse arrived, I immediately bought three more in the other designs because it‚Äôs just such a beautiful piece of art that you can also wear! I feel so happy and beautiful in this blouse!Read more

The colors are as vibrant as you see in the photos, the material is soft and shiny and the tops are so well made. More than all that - the designs are whimsical, bold, fun. The way the fabric, cut/shape and gorgeous designs come together always boosts my confidence when I wear them! Perfect under a suit for a professional meeting; equally fun with jeans for lunch with friends. Thank you, Hemloya :)
One tip: size up if you don‚Äôt want it to look super-fitted. Normally I‚Äôm an XS in tops, but purchased all in size M.Read more

I ordered a medium and it fits perfectly ( I am usually between a S and M, 36C). Wore it once so far and got tons of compliments!Read more

body: Love this shirt - the artwork and fabric are both exceptional. I am glad I followed the advice of other customers and took my measurements before ordering to ensure a perfect fit. This is truly a one of a kind shirt and is a delight to wear; perfect for dressing up with a jacket or going casual with jeans. I‚Äôll definitely be getting another  design!Read more

author: Hannah Ainsworth
title: Beautiful shirt and great fit!
body: Shirt print is as gorgeous in person as it looks online. Fabric is a good weight (not too thin) and looks well made (I feel like it will hold up for a long time). Shirt has a nice tailored look that remains crisp the whole day (thanks to fabric quality). Do follow the sizing guide. Based on sizing guide (and suggestions to size up), I bought a medium, despite usually being a XS or S in more mainstream brands. Medium was perfect fit. Highly recommend!Read more

author: E.T.
title: Pretty, but not busty-girl friendly :(
body:
First off, the print is vibrant and beautiful and it feels very high quality. The cut of it is very feminine and flattering. Despite what I‚Äôm about to say, I‚Äôm going to keep it since I love it so much and want to make it work.

I wear a 16/18 in most clothes, so I got a XXL to be safe (I also looked at the size chart). Unfortunately, this top has the problem most women‚Äôs button ups do: the bust!

I‚Äôm a DD, and even in my least padded and most constricting bra, I still get the ‚Äúgap‚Äù when buttoning up, since it can‚Äôt stretch over my chest. It‚Äôs not so tight that the shirt will rip off if I flex, but it‚Äôs noticeable and will have to be pinned to be wearable.

If you‚Äôve got a big chest, be careful. I hope women‚Äôs button ups start adding more buttons over the chest :(Read more

author: M Vigeo
title: Gorgeous shirts!
body: I absolutely love these shirts so much I got multiple prints. I love the bright colors, the soft silky fabric, and they are utterly comfortable. I have worn them each many times and people compliment them quite a lot (especially the bug one). SIZING: I am usually a Medium and ordered an XL due to the reviews and sizing chart and it is a perfect fit - so don't be afraid to go big. The customer service was excellent - the shop owner reached out to me to let me know one of the shirts was out of stock and would be a bit, but shipped the others super quick! Even messaged me again to let me know the one I was waiting on was in and being shipped. Definitely recommend.Read more

author: Alexandria Urell
body: I ordered this shirt along with the neon bugs print - they're both gorgeous, but this reminded me of a painting in my childhood bedroom and I got ALL the nostalgia. I had my eye on a few designs that would make great gifts for my mom, but I had to vet the company and quality before buying more. Shipping did take a bit, but the FAQ makes that very clear so I wasn't surprised. When my package was lost by the carrier (it happens to everyone), the support I received from the seller was phenomenal. I now have my two shirts, and I am over the moon! They're silky soft, and extremely flattering. Trust the sizing chart for chest measurement - I'm normally a large in women's tops, and the sizing chart said I was an XL. I ordered another size up (2XL) because I was afraid of not being able to wear my gorgeous shirts if they were too tight, and do wish I had gone withthe sizing chart recommendation. That said, even though I ordered a size larger than I was supposed to, the fit is still incredible. Nothing is hugging me tightly, but nothing is so boxy that it's unflattering, just oversized. Based on the feel of the fabric, I'm going to guess these need delicate care, but I know it'll be worth it. My husband pointed it out as soon as I opened my order up and said he loved it - he doesn't weigh in on my buys a lot! 10,000/10 I love this shop and love these designs!Read more

author: Alexandria Urell
title: Yes, it's actually as amazing as it looks
body:
I can't even remember how I found Hemloya, but I know it was because of an ad that had this shirt. I immediately ordered this and the Arcadia Button Up. I had my eye on a few designs that would make great gifts for my mom, but I had to vet the company and quality before buying more. Shipping did take a bit, but the FAQ makes that very clear so I wasn't surprised. When my package was lost by the carrier (it happens to everyone), the support I received from the seller was phenomenal. I now have my two shirts, and I am over the moon! They're silky soft, and extremely flattering. Trust the sizing chart for chest measurement - I'm normally a large in women's tops, and the sizing chart said I was an XL. I ordered another size up (2XL) because I was afraid of not being able to wear my gorgeous shirts if they were too tight, and do wish I had gone withthe sizing chart recommendation. That said, even though I ordered a size larger than I was supposed to, the fit is still incredible. Nothing is hugging me tightly, but nothing is so boxy that it's unflattering, just oversized. Based on the feel of the fabric, I'm going to guess these need delicate care, but I know it'll be worth it.

So, this bug print, right?! I wore this shirt the day I got it, and the first person I saw complimented the shirt immediately. The art is gorgeous, and a high quality with tons of details that really shine on the fabric and with the exciting colors. Because of the range of colors, I can match this with a lot. While I don't frequently need to dress professionally, unless in a staunch environment, I would feel comfortable wearing this with a suit to meet clients. That said, I usually wear it tucked into a pair of jeans! It looks great either way.Read more

title: Blown away!
body: Im blown away by the quality and beauty of the shirts I ordered from Hemloya! Theyre STUNNING! Additionally, the customer service was astounding- I ordered the incorrect size and she took so much time and care talking with me, asking about my needs, and making recommendations for the best fit for my measurements. This is beyond just a gorgeous product - the owner of Hemloya is truly a wonderful soul who has so much love and passion for her business. Ive never received such support and kindness from any other business. I will be ordering these shirts until I have one of every style and color. 10/10, five stars, will recommend Hemloya every single time!!!Read more

author: Nicole Rand
title: I feel amazing in this shirt
body: First off, the print is so unique. Secondly, the material is a wonderful quality. The shirt also washed really well, and when hung to dry it had minimal wrinkling, no shrinking. I am pretty much a universal M in all tops, but I followed the other reviewers and orderes a L. I am grateful I did! I have 39" hips and this would have been too snug in a M. I'm a 34 D and this falls just right in the chest. It's cut like a men's shirt really, even the buttons are on the opposite side of what I'm used to. I do recommend this shirt, just something worth noting!
